price: 86. Dheh: Idinkuma weydiisanayo wax abaalgud ah (gaarsiinta Dhambaalkan), mana ahi mid ka mid ah kuwa is yeel yeela (oo isku dhiba waxaan la amrin).
arabic: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَكَلِّفِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul mā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin wamā anā mina al-mutakalifīna
